        public boolean checkRegexAndIgnore​(GraphRewrite event,

      • getIgnoredFileRegexes

        public List<String> getIgnoredFileRegexes()

      • shouldScanFile

        public boolean shouldScanFile​(String path)
        This is similar to shouldScanPackage(String), except that it expects to be given a file path (for example, "/path/to/file.class"). This will use a string.contains approach, as we cannot know for sure what type of path prefixes may exist before the package name part of the path.

        Also, this can only work reliably for class files, though it will generally work with java files if they are in package appropriate folders.

      • shouldScanPackage

        public boolean shouldScanPackage​(String pkg)
        Indicates whether the provided package should be scanned (based upon the inclusion/exclusion lists).

      • isTargetDir

        public boolean isTargetDir​(FileModel file)
        Checks whether the path is called "target" and has a pom.xml file hanging from its parent.
        Parameters:
        file - the FileModel to check
        Returns:
        true if it's a target directory
